title: New Section: /gallery/
content:
Hello everyone!
I want to announce a new addition to Niupleis, the gallery is officially open! ðŸŽ¨âœ¨

In this new section, /gallery/, you will find one of my creative hubs in three sections:

1. Waifusâ€“ Here you can find Niupleis' original waifus, each in colorful and detailed illustrations.

2. Fanartsâ€“ Here I share my personal appreciation for characters from other artists.

3. Photographsâ€“ In this space, I plan to share images that capture moments and inspirations behind my art.

You can visit the page at niupleis.com/gallery

There isn't much content for now as it's just the beginning, but I'll try to update it constantly.
Bye!
